_header: Into thine hands Lord beteach I ghost mine
_description: In manus tuas, etc. — one long couplet

CamEmm27.First Lines:
In toe þine honden louerd bitech yh gost minneffor þov me
                    boȝtest soþfast god and lusedest vt of synne
CamEmm27.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 28.
